languages.text: {n}Канцлер держится непринужденно. Однако вас не покидает мысль, что задержка губернатора — небольшой политический жест, призванный нащупать границы дозволенного в общении с новым Вольным Торговцем.{/n}

{n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Канцлер держится непринужденно. Однако вас не покидает мысль, что задержка губернатора — небольшой политический жест, призванный нащупать границы дозволенного в общении с новым Вольным Торговцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia is acting nonchalantly. But you can't shake the thought that the governor being late is a subtle political gesture meant to find the boundaries of what's acceptable while interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Clementia is acting nonchalantly. But you can't shake the thought that the governor being late is a subtle political gesture meant to find the boundaries of what's acceptable while interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}韦尔森宰相的态度看起来从容不迫，但你脑中却无法摆脱这样的想法——总督的迟到行为是一种微妙的政治姿态，用来试探与新任行商浪人打交道时，可以在多大程度上讨价还价。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}韦尔森宰相的态度看起来从容不迫，但你脑中却无法摆脱这样的想法——总督的迟到行为是一种微妙的政治姿态，用来试探与新任行商浪人打交道时，可以在多大程度上讨价还价。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La canciller Werserian parece imperturbable, pero no logras quitarte la cabeza la idea de que la tardanza del gobernador es un sutil gesto político que tiene como intención descubrir los límites de lo aceptable al tratar con su nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La canciller Werserian parece imperturbable, pero no logras quitarte la cabeza la idea de que la tardanza del gobernador es un sutil gesto político que tiene como intención descubrir los límites de lo aceptable al tratar con su nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウェルザリアン議長は特に気にしていないようだが、総督の遅刻は新たな自由開拓者の忍耐や許容範囲を試すための政治的戦術なのではないかという気持ちが拭えない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウェルザリアン議長は特に気にしていないようだが、総督の遅刻は新たな自由開拓者の忍耐や許容範囲を試すための政治的戦術なのではないかという気持ちが拭えない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kanzlerin Werserian wirkt ruhig, aber du kannst dich des Gefühls nicht erwehren, dass die Verspätung des Gouverneurs eine subtile politische Geste ist, die die Grenzen testen soll, was {mf|der neue Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} bei Interaktionen noch für akzeptabel hält.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kanzlerin Werserian wirkt ruhig, aber du kannst dich des Gefühls nicht erwehren, dass die Verspätung des Gouverneurs eine subtile politische Geste ist, die die Grenzen testen soll, was {mf|der neue Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} bei Interaktionen noch für akzeptabel hält.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La chancelière a beau rester impassible, vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de penser que le retard du gouverneur est une manœuvre politique subtile visant à tester les limites de la tolérance {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La chancelière a beau rester impassible, vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de penser que le retard du gouverneur est une manœuvre politique subtile visant à tester les limites de la tolérance {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şansölye Werserian telaşsız görünüyor. Sense valinin geç kalmasının, yeni Hür Tacir ile etkileşimlerinde neyin kabul edilebilip neyin edilemeyeceğini deneme amacı güden, kurnaz bir politik hamle olabileceği düşüncesini üzerinden atamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Chancellor Werserian appears unruffled, but you cannot shake the thought that the governor's lateness is a subtle political gesture designed to test the limits of what is acceptable when it comes to interacting with the new Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şansölye Werserian telaşsız görünüyor ancak valinin geç kalmasının, yeni Hür Tacir ile etkileşimlerinde neyin kabul edilebilip neyin edilemeyeceğini deneme amacı güden kurnaz bir politik hamle olabileceği düşüncesini üzerinden atamıyorsun.{/n}
